####################################################################################################################
#                                                                                                                  #
#                                                                                                                  #
# This is the configure file for Recon Instruments Map (RIM)                                                       #
# We are making dymatical configuration of the interested nodes, ways and relations, which allow easily add/remove.#
# OSM nodes, ways and relations will be mapped into recon 'rmo' elements.                                          #
#                                                                                                                  #
####################################################################################################################

['NODE']
# This section is that configures the node in the format: {"OSM_TAG_KEY": "OSM_TAG_VALUE"}, "RECON_TYPE"
MAX_NUM_TAGS = 4
TAG0 ={"amenity":"toilets"}, "washroom"
TAG1 ={"amenity":"drinking_water"}, "drinkingwater"
TAG2 ={"amenity":"watering_point"}, "drinkingwater"
TAG3 ={"amenity":"watering_place"}, "drinkingwater"



####################################################################################################################
['WAY']
# This section is that configures the way in the format: {"OSM_TAG_KEY": "OSM_TAG_VALUE"}, "RECON_TYPE"

MAX_NUM_TAGS = 34
TAG0 ={"highway":"residential"}, "highway-residential road"
TAG1 ={"highway":"motorway"}, "highway-motorway"
TAG2 ={"highway":"trunk"}, "highway-primary"
TAG3 ={"highway":"primary"}, "highway-primary"
TAG4 ={"highway":"secondary"}, "highway-secondary"
TAG5 ={"highway":"tertiary"}, "highway-tertiary"
TAG6 ={"highway":"motorway_link"}, "highway-motorway"
TAG7 ={"highway":"trunk_link"}, "highway-primary"
TAG8 ={"highway":"primary_link"}, "highway-primary"
TAG9 ={"highway":"secondary_link"}, "highway-secondary"
TAG10 ={"highway":"tertiary_link"}, "highway-tertiary"
TAG11 ={"highway":"track"}, "dirt road"
TAG12 ={"surface":"unpaved"}, "dirt road"
TAG13 ={"leisure":"park"}, "park", "park"
TAG14 ={"leisure":"water_park"}, "park"
TAG15 ={"boundary":"national_park"}, "park", "park"
TAG16 ={"tourism":"theme_park"}, "park", "park"
TAG17 ={"landuse":"forest"}, "wood", "wood"
TAG18 ={"natural":"wood"}, "wood", "wood"
TAG19 ={"landuse":"reservoir"}, "water"
TAG20 ={"landuse":"salt_pond"}, "water", "water"
TAG21 ={"natural":"water"}, "water", "water"
TAG22 ={"natural":"beach"}, "land"
TAG23 ={"natural":"bay"}, "water", "water"
TAG24 ={"natural":"coastline"}, "ocean", "oceanGeo"
TAG25 ={"natural":"wetland"}, "webland", "wetland"
TAG26 ={"waterway":"riverbank"}, "ocean", "riverbank"
TAG27 ={"waterway":"*"}, "waterway", "waterway"
TAG28 ={"landuse":"grass"}, "park", "park"
TAG29 ={"landuse":"meadow"}, "park", "park"
TAG30 ={"landuse":"greenfield"}, "park", "park"
TAG31 ={"landuse":"village_green"}, "park", "park"
TAG32 ={"natural":"grassland"}, "park", "park"
TAG33 ={"admin_level":"2"}, "nationalborder"
#TAG34 ={"admin_level":"8"}, "citytown"

####################################################################################################################
["RELATION"]
MAX_NUM_TAGS = 34
TAG0 ={"highway":"residential"}, "highway-residential road"

['NODE_DISP_TAGS']
# This section is that configures the Node Tags that it will be showed in output xml file
MAX_NUM_TAGS = 5
TAG0 ="name"
TAG1 ="place"
TAG2 ="highway"
TAG3 ="shop"
TAG4 ="amenity"

####################################################################################################################
['WAY_DISP_TAGS']
# This section is that configures the Way Tags that will be showed in output xml file
MAX_NUM_TAGS = 6

TAG0 ="name"
TAG1 ="highway"
TAG2 ="landuse"
TAG3 ="natural"
TAG4 ="leisure"
TAG5 ="surface"



####################################################################################################################
['RELATION_DISP_TAGS']
# This section is that configures the Relation Tags that will be showed in output xml file
MAX_NUM_TAGS = 6

TAG0 ="name"
TAG1 ="highway"
TAG2 ="landuse"
TAG3 ="natural"
TAG4 ="leisure"
TAG5 ="surface"
